There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around June 30th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsdaughter was standing outside garage and yelled for me to come look at what she was seeing i came out of garage and witnessed two glowing orbs flying straight path from south heading north as i walked futher out witnessed two to three more glowing slow moving orbs following along the same path followed by a couple more they appeared to have a glowing aura surrounding them almost like the outline of a parachute or jellyfish we watched as they all passed by and disappeared into the haze they made no sound and several people in the neighborhood witnessed the orbs
Summary: glowing orbs came from n to s
